description: Imagine if the world as you know it... was nothing more than an illusion. What if creatures like elves, dragons, vampire, zombies and werewolves walk amongst you every day... But you never see them. This is the world I walk in. I am called Byron and these are my chronicles.
title: Darker Projects: The Byron Chronicles

episodes.title: The Byron Chronicles moves to EricBusbyPresents.com
episodes.description:
The Byron Chronicles moves to EricBusbyPresents

Future episodes of The Byron Chronicles can be found at EricBusbyPresents.com.
